description: [Reuters] - The following are the top stories on the business pages of British newspapers. * Funding Circle, a peer-to-peer lending marketplace used by small and medium-sized companies, has secured $100 million from some of the world's leading venture capital firms. * Prime Minister Theresa May will lay out her plans for Britain's exit from the European Union (EU) on Tuesday, in a major speech that will be closely scrutinised in financial markets, and by other European leaders.
